title.default: ON SALE for 6th Anniversary Celebration - Annual lowest price

message.default:
In 2017, Pure Writer launched its first version on Google Play, starting a "long-year project". During these 6 years, we submitted a total of 10,000 updates, ranging from v1.0 to v24.2.1, in the latest version, we have implemented great functions such as Multi-line Shortcut Bar, Dynamic indentation & OneDrive support for CloudSync (Free).

Therefore, during 2023.8.10 ~ 2023.8.30, for the 6th Anniversary Celebration, Pure Writer Pro (lifetime), originally priced at US$25(tax not included), is discounted to US$13.99(tax not included).
